downloadTitle: SQL Server Deployment Options in Azure
downloadDescription: SQL Server Deployment Options in Azure
detailsSection:
This guidance document was created to review options you have to migrate your SQL server workload in 
Azure as each option is designed to support specific use cases. Azure services include both IaaS and PaaS 
offerings which means you can have your SQL Server workloads running in a hosted infrastructure (IaaS) or 
in a managed service (PaaS). However, within Azure PaaS, Azure has multiple deployment options and each 
deployment option has multiple service tiers. Purpose of this document is to help you narrow down the 
options and do further due diligence to finalize the target platform for your SQL workload.
